title: Merkel, Macron plot reform path: rocky road ahead?
text:
Merkel, Macron plot reform path: rocky road ahead? 12:30pm EDT - 01:47 
The leaders of Germany and France met on Thursday to try to work out a common position on reforming the euro zone, a sensitive issue that is testing the new government in Berlin just a month after it took office. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The leaders of Germany and France met on Thursday to try to work out a common position on reforming the euro zone, a sensitive issue that is testing the new government in Berlin just a month after it took office.
